heisig_chinese_memo: Now that we have so many translate apps you can have words with even a mermaid.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the words (言) you use to spy on (睪) are a reason
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: This magial scarecrow can translate the words of his master into bird language thus further scaring the birds.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " speak " to " sui " sound. The original meaning is a person who interprets foreign languages. "Shuowen": "Translate, interpret the words of the four barbarians. From the words, the sound of the testiment." Such as "Book of Rites. "The rule of the king": "The people of the five directions have different language and different appetites. To express their aspirations and to pass their desires: the east is called mail, the south is called elephant, the west is called Di Yan, and the north is called translation." Kong Yingdashu: "The northern language official said it Said the translator, translated, Chen Ye, that Chen said the words of the outside and the inside." "Han Shu. "Fu Chang Zheng Gan Chen Duan Chuan": "(Jie Zi) immediately issued gold coins to show the translation. The translation returned to the king, the king is greedy for Chinese things, and come to see the messenger."

" Translation " also means translation, which refers to the conversion of one language into another. Such as "Historical Records. "The Family of Three Kings": "The distant place has special vulgarity, and the re-translation is the dynasty, and the side is outside." "Re-translation" means translation after many times. "anthology. Zuo Taichong "Wei Du Fu": "The barbaric barbarians live in a tribe, and the translation is fluent, and the birds and beasts are the gangsters." Li Zhouhan's note: "Translation, easy to guide, to introduce. Don’t know that Zhongxia is not aware of it. Those who come to Korea will make people change their words and draw them through.”

" Translation " also means interpretation and exposition. "Zhengzitong. "Yanbu": "Translation, wherever the interpretation of the classics is also called translation." Such as "The Latent. "Achievement Appraisal": "The husband and the sage are Tiankou, and the sage is the translation of the sage." Liu Zongyuan of the Tang Dynasty "Tian Dui": "Which one can translate the dream?"
humanum_short_description_en: From " speak " to " sui " sound. The original meaning is a person who interprets foreign languages.
humanum_full_description:
從「言」，「睪」聲。本義是傳譯外族語言的人。《說文》：「譯，傳譯四夷之言者。从言，睪聲。」如《禮記．王制》：「五方之民，言語不通，嗜欲不同。達其志，通其欲：東方曰寄，南方曰象，西方曰狄鞮，北方曰譯。」孔穎達疏：「通傳北方語官謂之曰譯者，譯，陳也，謂陳說外內之言。」《漢書．傅常鄭甘陳段傳》：「（介子）即出金幣以示譯。譯還報王，王貪漢物，來見使者。」

　　「譯」也表示翻譯，指把一種語言轉換成另一種語言。如《史記．三王世家》：「遠方殊俗，重譯而朝，澤及方外。」「重譯」意謂經過多次的輾轉翻譯。《文選．左太沖〈魏都賦〉》：「蠻陬夷落，譯導而通，鳥獸之氓也。」李周翰注：「譯，易也。導，引也。言蠻夷聚居部落，言詞殊別，不為中夏所識，有來朝者，則使人傳易其語，引而通之。」

　　「譯」還表示闡釋、訓釋。《正字通．言部》：「譯，凡詁譯經義亦曰譯。」如《潛夫論．考績》：「夫聖人為天口，賢者為聖譯。」唐代柳宗元〈天對〉：「盡邑以墊，孰譯彼夢？」
humanum_short_description: 從「言」，「睪」聲。本義是傳譯外族語言的人。

譯字的基本解释

譯
yì
见“译”。

譯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yì］
［《廣韻》羊益切，入昔，以。］
“译1”的繁体字。
(1)翻译。把一种语言文字转换成另一种语言文字。
(2)指翻译人员。
(3)指语言不通的异域。
(4)阐述；诠释。
(5)变易，改变。参见“譯形借聲”。
(6)通“繹”。寻绎。参见“譯審”。
(7)通“擇”。选择。参见“譯居”。

譯字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　譯； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1183第19
【唐韻】羊昔切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】夷益切，?音繹。【說文】傳譯四夷之言者。【揚子·方言】傳也。又見也。【註】傳宣語卽相見。【禮·王制】北方曰譯。【疏】通傳北方語官謂之譯。譯，?也。謂?說外內之言。劉氏曰：譯，釋也。猶言謄也。謂以彼此言語相謄釋而通之也。越裳氏重九譯而朝是也。【周禮·秋官·象胥·賈疏】北方曰譯者，譯卽易，謂換易言語，使相解也。　又【正字通】凡詁釋經義亦曰譯。　又官名。【前漢·百官公卿表】大鴻臚屬官有行人譯官。又典屬國屬官有九譯令。　又叶弋灼切，音藥。【張華·七命】語不傳於輶軒，地不被乎正朔，莫不駿奔稽顙，委質重譯。　【說文】本作?。

譯字的源字形

小篆楷体

譯字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yì］
["Guangyun" Yang Yi cut, into the past, to. ]
Traditional characters of "译1".
(1) Translation. Convert one language and text into another language and text.
(2) Refers to translators.
(3) Refers to a foreign land with a language barrier.
(4) Elaboration; interpretation.
(5) Change, change. See "translated form borrowed voice".
(6) Through "deduction". Xunyi. See "Translation Review".
(7) Through "selection". select. See "Translation".
